page.title: 07HOUSING TRENDS IN DONCASTER
page.content: HOUSING PROVISION IN DONCASTER SUITS MOST PEOPLE FROM THE RISING EXECUTIVE TO THE SENIOR CITIZEN.THERE ARE OVER 100,000 HOUSES IN THE AREA,RANGING FROM DETACHED HOMES TO 9 HIGH-RISE COUNCIL FLATS. HOUSING PRICES ARE STILL AMONGST THE LOWEST IN THE COUNTRY.NEW ESTATES ARE BEING BUILT IN THE AREA BY BOTH DONCASTER COUNCIL AND PRIVATE PROPERTY DEVELOPERS. DONCASTER COUNCIL IS AN IMPORTANT HOUSING AUTHORITY.A MAJOR NEW TREND HAS BEEN A SCHEME ENABLING TENANTS TO BUY COUNCIL HOUSES.ALMOST 1/5 OF PEOPLE PREVIOUSLY RENTING HOUSES IN THE AREA HAVE NOW BOUGHT THEM.PURPOSE BUILT O.A.P. BUNGALOWS WITH WARDEN SERVICES ARE COUNCIL PROVIDED AS ARE DISABLED PERSONS'BUNGALOWS. THERE IS ALSO A SCHEME FOR CONVERTING EXISTING HOUSES INTO HOMES FOR THE DISABLED.
